3d_scene.description: Abstract floating geometric shapes (wireframe cubes or spheres) that rotate slowly and react to mouse position. Use neon green wireframes.
3d_scene.location: Upload Step in /tool and Hero Background

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors provided in this JSON. Use the 'Acid Lime' (#CCFF00) as the primary color. Ensure 'dark' class is always applied to the html/body.
2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
3. LAYOUT: For the Landing Page, use a 'Bento Grid' layout for features. Do not use standard 3-column rows.
4. 3D: Implement a simple React Three Fiber scene in the 'Upload' step of the tool. It should be a rotating wireframe object that signifies 'processing' or 'tech'.
5. STEPPER: Build a custom stepper for /tool. It should be minimal (Just text labels 'Upload', 'Payment', 'Prompt' with a progress line).
6. GLASSMORPHISM: Use the glass_morphism utility class defined in visual_enhancers for the Navbar and any floating modals.
7. NOISE: Add the noise texture to the body background to prevent the 'flat digital' look.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) as requested.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic gradients or centered layouts everywhere.
Dark Mode Only: This app is strictly dark mode. Do not implement a light mode toggle.
Sharp Edges: Use rounded-sm or rounded-none for a more 'technical/pro' feel. Avoid fully rounded buttons.
Micro-interactions: Add hover states to everything. Buttons should lift or glow on hover.
Spacing: Use double the spacing you think you need. p-12 is better than p-6.
